alert.note: Alert for Bell; Coryell; Lampasas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 16 at 11:00AM CDT until September 16 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Coryell County in central Texas... Southeastern Lampasas County in central Texas... Southwestern Bell County in central Texas... * Until 1145 AM CDT. * At 1100 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kempner, or near Copperas Cove, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Killeen, Copperas Cove, Harker Heights, Belton, Fort Cavazos, Nolanville, Morgan`s Point Resort, Salado, Kempner, Stillhouse Hollow Lake, Belton Lake, Union Grove, Ding Dong, Maxdale, Cedar Valley, Rumley, Youngsport, and Woodland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
